name: ThePlaneWar
description:
This is a support online combat aircraft war small game, with friends to create a room, to a tense and exciting melee is the core gameplay of this game

The game can enter the lobby, create and join rooms, or go directly to offline mode to start the game

Includes 9 model aircraft, a dozen aircraft bullet and missile effects to choose from, and 2 maps for combat

It can be operated using a joystick or gyroscope, and the plane flies with the physical engine

You can also add bots, voice conversations

There's hit feedback, radar, missile warning, blood strips from friend or foe, bullets falling, missile tracking, aircraft explosion effects

The plane will kill itself when it crashes or flies off the battlefield. After respawn, the robot AI can automatically fly and fight

There is a scoreboard, click the scoreboard to observe the first view of other aircraft

A battle 10 minutes, I hope you like!

Tip: If the display information is too large, please turn down your display DPI！
